alert.note: Alert for Scioto (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 12:02PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN LEWIS, SOUTHEASTERN ADAMS AND NORTHWESTERN SCIOTO COUNTIES THROUGH 1245 PM EDT... At 1201 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Vanceburg, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Portsmouth, Vanceburg, Rosemount, Clarktown, Lucasville, Lombardsville, Sandy Springs, Buena Vista in Scioto County, Saint Paul, Minford, West Portsmouth, State Route 335 at State Route 776, Turkey Creek Lake, Friendship, Mcdermott, Bear Creek and Garrison. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM EDT for northeastern Kentucky...and southwestern Ohio. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
